title: Assessment of the phytotoxicity of HNTs on two plants, Cynodon dactylon and Brassica rapa L
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3066-3079
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00897E, Paper
Ming Huang, Jiawei Huang, Haohong Yu, Qili Fangzhang, Mingxian Liu
High concentration of HNTs dispersion inhibited plant growth, and HNTs dispersion was more phytotoxic to Brassica rapa L than Cynodon dactylon.
